```{python}
#| echo: false
#| warning: false
#| fig-width: 8
#| fig-height: 6
#| interactive: true

import numpy as np
import plotly.graph_objects as go

# Create a grid for the bowl
w0_range = np.linspace(-6, 6, 100)
w1_range = np.linspace(-6, 6, 100)
W0, W1 = np.meshgrid(w0_range, w1_range)
Z = W0**2 + W1**2

# Define Points A and B
w0_A, w1_A = 2, 2
loss_A = w0_A**2 + w1_A**2

w0_B, w1_B = -4, -4
loss_B = w0_B**2 + w1_B**2

fig = go.Figure()

# Surface
fig.add_trace(go.Surface(
    z=Z,
    x=W0,
    y=W1,
    colorscale='Rainbow',
    showscale=False,
    name='Loss Surface'
))

# Point A
fig.add_trace(go.Scatter3d(
    x=[w0_A], y=[w1_A], z=[loss_A],
    mode='markers+text',
    marker=dict(color='black', size=8, symbol='diamond'),
    text=["A"],
    textposition="top center",
    name=f"Point A: w₀={w0_A}, w₁={w1_A}, Loss={loss_A}",
    showlegend=True
))

# Point B
fig.add_trace(go.Scatter3d(
    x=[w0_B], y=[w1_B], z=[loss_B],
    mode='markers+text',
    marker=dict(color='red', size=8, symbol='square'),
    text=["B"],
    textposition="top center",
    name=f"Point B: w₀={w0_B}, w₁={w1_B}, Loss={loss_B}",
    showlegend=True
))

# Layout with legend floating over plot
fig.update_layout(
    title="Bowl-Shape of a Convex Loss Function",
    scene=dict(
        xaxis_title='w₀ (Intercept)',
        yaxis_title='w₁ (Slope)',
        zaxis_title='Loss'
    ),
    legend=dict(
        x=0.02,
        y=0.98,
        xanchor='left',
        yanchor='top',
        bgcolor='rgba(255,255,255,0.6)',
        bordercolor='black',
        borderwidth=1
    ),
    width=800,
    height=600
)

fig.show()

```
